name: Emerginvest
tag_list: techcrunch50, tc50, finance, online-media, emerging-markets, stocks, portfolio-tools, investments
overview:
Emerginvest is a website which helps investors research international stock markets, and then shows them how they can invest there.

Emerginvest (a free service) is connecting investors to hundreds of thousands of undiscovered, international companies by providing data, research, and tools on 150+ world stock exchanges. Emerginvest lets anyone â€“ even those who arenâ€™t familiar with world markets â€“ find international stocks to invest in. After a few minutes of browsing, investors can find companies in emerging markets like China, or in frontier markets such as Vietnam or Botswana.

Once a user finds an investment, Emerginvest can recommend all of the ways that an investor can own that particular stock â€“ whether through suggesting local, English-speaking brokerages, or domestic vehicles such as mutual funds, ETFs, and ADRs.
